XDmaPs Struct Reference

#include <xdmaps.h>

XDmaPs_Config Config

XDmaPs_ChannelData Chans [XDMAPS_CHANNELS_PER_DEV]

Detailed Description

The XDmaPs driver instance data structure. A pointer to an instance data structure is passed around by functions to refer to a specific driver instance.
